revised_title: Vitruvius and the Interpretation of Architectural Texts
tldr: The author discusses the challenges of translating Vitruvius' architectural texts and the importance of clear explanations for understanding the material. They also highlight the role of notes and illustrations in aiding comprehension, as well as the need for accurate translations for those who are not fluent in Latin or Greek.
